column2: Formulate an ontology related to judge. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```ttl@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix ex: <http://example.org/judiciary#> .ex:Judge a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Judge" ;    rdfs:comment "A person responsible for overseeing the legal process in courts." .ex:Court a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Court" ;    rdfs:comment "A legal institution where a judge presides." .ex:Judgment a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Judgment" ;    rdfs:comment "A formal decision given by a judge or court." .ex:LegalCase a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Legal Case" ;    rdfs:comment "A dispute between parties that is resolved in a court of law." .ex:presidesOver a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "presides over" ;    rdfs:domain ex:Judge ;    rdfs:range ex:Court ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the court a judge presides over." .ex:deliversJudgmentOn a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "delivers judgment on" ;    rdfs:domain ex:Judge ;    rdfs:range ex:LegalCase ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the legal case a judge delivers judgment on." .ex:isPartOf a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "is part of" ;    rdfs:domain ex:LegalCase ;    rdfs:range ex:Court ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the court a legal case is part of." .ex:involves a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "involves" ;    rdfs:domain ex:LegalCase ;    rdfs:range rdf:Resource ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the parties involved in a legal case." .ex:decisionDate a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:label "decision date" ;    rdfs:domain ex:Judgment ;    rdfs:range xsd:date ;    rdfs:comment "The date when a judgment is delivered." .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: judge. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology/judge#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Judge rdf:type owl:Class ;       rdfs:label "Judge" ;       rdfs:comment "A person who presides over court proceedings" .:Court rdf:type owl:Class ;       rdfs:label "Court" ;       rdfs:comment "A governmental institution with the authority to adjudicate legal disputes" .:LegalCase rdf:type owl:Class ;           rdfs:label "Legal Case" ;           rdfs:comment "A dispute between parties that is resolved through the legal process" .:Hearing rdf:type owl:Class ;         rdfs:label "Hearing" ;         rdfs:comment "A session at which a judge listens to the arguments of opposing parties" .:deliberatesOn rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;               rdfs:domain :Judge ;               rdfs:range :LegalCase ;               rdfs:label "deliberates on" ;               rdfs:comment "Indicates the legal case a judge is considering" .:presidesOver rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;              rdfs:domain :Judge ;              rdfs:range :Court ;              rdfs:label "presides over" ;              rdfs:comment "Indicates the court over which a judge has control" .:inChargesOf rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;             rdfs:domain :Judge ;             rdfs:range :Hearing ;             rdfs:label "in charges of" ;             rdfs:comment "Indicates the hearing a judge is responsible for" .:hasJudgmentOn rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;               rdfs:domain :LegalCase ;               rdfs:range :Judge ;               rdfs:label "has judgment on" ;               rdfs:comment "Indicates the judge that gives a ruling on a legal case" .:hasCourtCase rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;              rdfs:domain :Court ;              rdfs:range :LegalCase ;              rdfs:label "has court case" ;              rdfs:comment "Indicates the legal cases that are held in a court" .:isHandledBy rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;             rdfs:domain :Hearing ;             rdfs:range :Judge ;             rdfs:label "is handled by" ;             rdfs:comment "Indicates the judge handling a particular hearing" .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: judge.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/judge#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Judge rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Judge" ;    rdfs:comment "A person who presides over court proceedings." .:Person rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Person" ;    rdfs:comment "An individual human being." .:LegalCase rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Legal Case" ;    rdfs:comment "A legal proceeding in a court." .:hasName rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Person ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has name" ;    rdfs:comment "The name of a person." .:presidesOver rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Judge ;    rdfs:range :LegalCase ;    rdfs:label "presides over" ;    rdfs:comment "A relationship between a judge and a legal case they oversee." .:decision rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :LegalCase ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "decision" ;    rdfs:comment "The decision made in a legal case." .:isEmployedBy rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Judge ;    rdfs:range :Court ;    rdfs:label "is employed by" ;    rdfs:comment "A relationship between a judge and an employing court." .:Court rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Court" ;    rdfs:comment "A tribunal in which legal cases are heard." .:isPartOf rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Court ;    rdfs:range :JudicialSystem ;    rdfs:label "is part of" ;    rdfs:comment "A relationship indicating a court's involvement within a judicial system." .:JudicialSystem rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Judicial System" ;    rdfs:comment "A system of courts that interprets and applies the law." .:Judge rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Person .```
